ClosePlanets.title: Close Planets
ClosePlanets.tooltip: Enables placements for all planets and possible moons in the Real Solar System around Sol.

DistantPlanets.title: Distant Planets
DistantPlanets.tooltip: Enables placements for planets and moons around Alpha Centauri, Proxima Centauri, and Barnard's Star

Hints.title: Enable Hints
Hints.tooltip: Allows hints to spawn on Real Solar System planets and moons
